self_predictions.prediction_summary: Prudnik believes it will be a very difficult fight, especially if he cannot prepare well for Michael Todd's style. He thinks his side pressure and top roll are strong for his weight, but Michael's experience and style make it a 50-50 match.
self_predictions.style_conflict: Michael Todd's open arm top roll vs Prudnik's side pressure and top roll.

Michael Todd.strength: Very experienced with a unique and effective style.
Michael Todd.previous_match_summary: Michael has stopped strong opponents like Pushkar in the past.

self_predictions.prediction_summary: Prudnik is open to pulling Devon Larratt after beating Michael Todd, but no specific predictions were made about the outcome.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Prudnik thinks Morozov has a slight chance to win, especially if he can hook Lutidze quickly. He believes Lutidze has strong side pressure but weak points in his wrist and fingers.
third_party_predictions.style_conflict: Morozov's hook vs Lutidze's side pressure.

Revaz Lutidze.strength: Strong side pressure but weak wrist and fingers.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Prudnik thinks if Petrenko comes in very good shape, it could be a 50-50 match, but he believes John Brzenk has the edge due to his power and experience.
third_party_predictions.style_conflict: Petrenko's quick start vs Brzenk's power and slow start.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Prudnik believes Rustam Babaev will win if he is in good shape, due to his strong hand and good position.
Prudnik thinks it will be an interesting fight but is unsure about the outcome, especially if Tobias is stronger than last time.

Tobias Sporrong.strength: Quick and strong, especially on the left.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Prudnik believes Ongarbaev can beat Todd Hutchings due to his quick start and experience.
Engin agrees with Prudnik that Morozov has a slight chance to win, especially if he can hook Lutidze quickly.
third_party_predictions.style_conflict: Morozov's hook vs Lutidze's side pressure.

Revaz Lutidze.strength: Strong side pressure but weak wrist and fingers.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Engin thinks John Brzenk will win due to his power and experience, even if Petrenko comes in good shape.
third_party_predictions.style_conflict: Petrenko's quick start vs Brzenk's power and slow start.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Paulo thinks Prudnik is a slight favorite but warns not to underestimate Michael Todd's experience and unique style.
third_party_predictions.style_conflict: Michael Todd's king's move vs Prudnik's side pressure and top roll.

Michael Todd.strength: Very experienced with a unique and effective style.
Michael Todd.previous_match_summary: Michael has stopped strong opponents like Pushkar in the past.

Evgeny Prudnik.strength: Strong side pressure and top roll.
